components/common/pagination:
{{#if pagination.links.length}}
{{#if pagination.previous}} {{lang 'common.pagination.previous'}} {{lang 'common.pagination.page'}} {{/if}} {{#each pagination.links}} {{#if number '===' ../pagination.current}} {{number}} {{else}} {{number}} {{/if}} {{/each}} {{#if pagination.next}} {{lang 'common.pagination.next'}} {{lang 'common.pagination.page'}} {{/if}}
{{/if}} {{lang 'common.back_to_top'}}
components/products/grid:
{{#if products.length}}
{{#each products}} {{> components/products/product-item grid_class=grid_class show_compare=../show_compare enable_quick_shop=../enable_quick_shop show_sale_badges=../theme_settings.sale-badges default_image=../theme_settings.default_image show_ratings=../settings.show_product_rating image_has_aspect=../theme_settings.product_grid_image_aspect_ratio price_range_display=../theme_settings.price_range_display retail_price_label=../theme_settings.retail-price-label non_sale_price_label=../theme_settings.non-sale-price-label sale_price_label=../theme_settings.sale-price-label price_label=../theme_settings.price-label }} {{/each}}
{{lang 'compare.compare_up_to_x_items' num=4}}
{{lang 'compare.clear_compare' num=4}}
    {{else}}
    {{lang 'product.no_products'}}
    {{/if}}
components/products/product-index-header:
{{!-- TODO: not doable at this time Viewing 21 — 52 of {{{category.total_products}}} items --}}
{{#if sort}} {{#if sort '===' 'relevance'}}{{lang 'common.sorter.relevance'}}{{/if}} {{#if sort '===' 'featured'}}{{lang 'common.sorter.featured'}}{{/if}} {{#if sort '===' 'newest'}}{{lang 'common.sorter.newest'}}{{/if}} {{#if sort '===' 'bestselling'}}{{lang 'common.sorter.top_sellers'}}{{/if}} {{#if sort '===' 'alphaasc'}}{{lang 'common.sorter.alpha_asc'}}{{/if}} {{#if sort '===' 'alphadesc'}}{{lang 'common.sorter.alpha_desc'}}{{/if}} {{#if sort '===' 'avgcustomerreview'}}{{lang 'common.sorter.reviews'}}{{/if}} {{#if sort '===' 'priceasc'}}{{lang 'common.sorter.price_asc'}}{{/if}} {{#if sort '===' 'pricedesc'}}{{lang 'common.sorter.price_desc'}}{{/if}} {{else}} {{lang 'common.sorter.featured'}} {{/if}}
components/products/product-item:
{{#if out_of_stock_message}}
{{out_of_stock_message}}
{{else}} {{#if price.saved}} {{> core/products/sale-badge classes='product-item-sale-tag' }} {{/if}} {{/if}}
{{! components/products/product-item-swatch-row}}

{{name}}

{{#if price}}
{{> core/products/price price=price show_savings=false show_tax_labels=true show_sale_badges=false price_range_display=price_range_display retail_price_label=retail_price_label non_sale_price_label=non_sale_price_label sale_price_label=sale_price_label price_label=price_label }}
{{/if}} {{#if show_ratings}}
{{> components/products/ratings rating=rating size="small" }}
{{/if}} {{#if show_compare}} {{/if}}
{{#if enable_quick_shop}} {{lang 'product.quick_view'}} {{/if}}
components/products/ratings: {{#for 1 5}} {{/for}}
